bill_title: provide for the distribution of a list of possible reasonable accommodations to students with disabilities.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to provide for the distribution of a list of possible reasonable accommodations to students with disabilities. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added: 13-37-62. List of possible reasonable accommodations--Students with disabilities. Prior to any individualized education program team meeting, or any meeting regarding the development of a plan for a student under section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, or any other meeting regarding a student with a disability, the student, if attending the meeting, and the student's parent or guardian shall be provided with a list of possible reasonable accommodations for students with disabilities. The list shall be compiled by the Department of Education and provided to all schools for distribution pursuant to this section. The list shall be provided to any student with a disability as defined by the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990 as in effect on January 1, 2020, and the student's parent or guardian regardless of whether the student is receiving special education or special education and related services or is under a plan for the student under section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973.
